query.q: IRATE("M::`istio_prom`:(AVG(`istio_requests_total`) AS `result`) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `destination_workload_namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `destination_workload` = '#{workload}' and `reporter` = '#{qrep}' } BY `response_code`").SERIES_SUM()

children.q: WINDOW("M::`istio_prom`:(AVG(`istio_requests_total`)) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `reporter` = '#{qrep}' and `destination_workload_namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `destination_workload` = '#{workload}' and `response_code` != re('50.*') and `destination_service` = '#{dstsvc}' } BY `destination_service`", '5m')

query.q: eval(A/B, A="WINDOW(\"M::`istio_prom`:(AVG(`istio_requests_total`)) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `reporter` = '#{qrep}' and `destination_workload_namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `destination_workload` = '#{workload}' and `response_code` != re('50.*') and `destination_service` = '#{dstsvc}' } BY `destination_service`\", '5m')", B="WINDOW(\"M::`istio_prom`:(AVG(`istio_requests_total`)) { `cluster_name_k8s` = '#{cluster_name_k8s}' and `reporter` = '#{qrep}' and `destination_workload_namespace` = '#{namespace}' and `destination_workload` = '#{workload}'  and `destination_service` = '#{dstsvc}' } BY `destination_service`\", '5m')")
